Question: Beginning at age 16, Temple **** served as secretary to his grandfather during his mission to Paris during the Revolutionary War.
Hints: This person was born on Milk Street, in Boston, Massachusetts, on January 17, 1706 and baptized at Old South Meeting House.
According to David Morgan, this person was a proponent of religion in general.
Along with the regular issue stamps this person however only appears on a few commemorative stamps.
